医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动诱导的激素鸢尾素在β淀粉样蛋白减少中的作用研究人员探索了运动诱导的鸢尾素减轻阿尔茨海默病中β-淀粉样蛋白病理的生物学机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/The-role-of-exercise-induced-hormone-irisin-in-amyloid-beta-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/The-role-of-exercise-induced-hormone-irisin-in-amyloid-beta-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9756a6-22e0-4477-b560-bb6d049d9c30 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:58:00 -0400 The role of exercise-induced hormone irisin in amyloid beta reduction
MASLD患者的一级亲属患肝脏相关疾病的风险较高根据瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院在《肝脏病学杂志》上发表的一项国家研究，代谢相关脂肪肝患者的近亲患肝癌和死于肝脏相关疾病的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/First- Degree-relatives-of-病人-with-MASLD-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-liver-lated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/First- Degree-relatives-of-病人-with-MASLD-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-liver-lated-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fa24e8c-1550-4cba-afc1-a1b139fcd85e Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:47:28 -0400 First-degree relatives of patients with MASLD have higher risk of developing liver-related diseases
UTSA 研究人员研究 Sweet Annie 药用化合物的作用机制在瓦莱丽·斯彭塞尔 (Valerie Sponsel) 的 UTSA 生物实验室里，整齐地摆放在两排陶土花盆中的高大芳香植物中长出了充满活力的绿叶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTSA-researchers-study-the-mechanism-of-action-of-Sweet-Annies-medicinal-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTSA-researchers-study-the-mechanism-of-action-of-Sweet-Annies-medicinal-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c82d5bb0-d3d5-4b0d-9f1a-e5aaaa7ebabd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:38:37 -0400 UTSA researchers study the mechanism of action of Sweet Annie's medicinal compounds
Senolytic 治疗轻度阿尔茨海默病的 I 期试验显示安全性研究人员对有症状和早期阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 患者进行了口服 senolytic 疗法的 1 期试验，该疗法包含槲皮素 (Q) 和达沙替尼 (D)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Senolytic-therapy-in-mild-Alzheimere28099s-disease-shows-safety-in-phase-I-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Senolytic-therapy-in-mild-Alzheimere28099s-disease-shows-safety-in-phase-I-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47c55ca2-1767-4b08-ba3b-3e25d1d4121e Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:34:00 -0400 Senolytic therapy in mild Alzheimer’s disease shows safety in phase I trial
有希望的新宫颈癌检测填补了巴氏试验所遗漏的空白研究人员评估了一种新型人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 和宿主脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 甲基化评分，用于原位腺癌 (AIS) 和宫颈腺癌 (ADC) 筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Promising-new-cervical-cancer-test-fills-in-the-gap-missed-by-P​​ap-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Promising-new-cervical-cancer-test-fills-in-the-gap-missed-by-P​​ap-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7814bec-ad9a-497a-8fc9-4be32c631fee Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:16:00 -0400 Promising new cervical cancer test fills in the gap missed by Pap tests
俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心首次实施 ALS 靶向基因治疗俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心是全国第一家对特定形式的肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者进行靶向基因治疗的中心之一，ALS 是一种影响大脑和脊柱细胞的神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ohio-State-University-Wexner-Medical-Center-administers-first-targeted-gene-therapy-for-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ohio-State-University-Wexner-Medical-Center-administers-first-targeted-gene-therapy-for-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3d20e25-3615-42e5-8a13-95078d5b52ad Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center administers first targeted gene therapy for ALS
生酮饮食有望解决与多囊卵巢综合症相关的荷尔蒙失衡问题研究人员对生酮饮食对多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）的影响进行了荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-addressing-hormonal-imbalance- Associated-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-addressing-hormonal-imbalance- Associated-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfe314fd-9c21-44b1-bee8-17cf25e8f9dd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:54:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet shows promise in addressing hormonal imbalance associated with PCOS
眼球追踪技术可以帮助改善痴呆症老年人的生活质量评估居住在住宅老年护理机构中的澳大利亚人中有超过 50% 被诊断出患有痴呆症，世界各地的老年护理服务机构都在为未来 30 年 65 岁及以上的老年人数量增加一倍做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Eye-tracking-technology-can-help-improve-quality-of-life-assessment-for-older-people-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Eye-tracking-technology-can-help-improve-quality-of-life-assessment-for-older-people-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=230b83dc-b0d9-4a2e-ac8c-66b62e625fd6 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:52:31 -0400 Eye-tracking technology can help improve quality of life assessment for older people with dementia
年度 NHS 儿童流感疫苗接种计划正在进行中针对 2 至 3 岁儿童、学龄儿童和 6 个月以上患有某些健康问题的儿童的年度 NHS 流感疫苗接种计划正在进行中。家长将从下周开始收到邀请。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Annual-NHS-flu-vaccination-program-for-children-is-getting-underway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Annual-NHS-flu-vaccination-program-for-children-is-getting-underway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6489918-78ba-4562-a835-58cb636fce74 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:37:52 -0400 Annual NHS flu vaccination program for children is getting underway
突破性的全基因组研究发现了影响载脂蛋白 E 水平和阿尔茨海默病风险的新位点影响血浆载脂蛋白 E 水平的新遗传因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Breakthrough-genome-wide-study-uncovers-new-loci-impacting-apolipo Protein-E-levels-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Breakthrough-genome-wide-study-uncovers-new-loci-impacting-apolipo Protein-E-levels-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=118abf79-710b-445a-b32c-44b78739c332 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 09:35:00 -0400 Breakthrough genome-wide study uncovers new loci impacting apolipoprotein E levels and Alzheimer's risk
